main.name: Suman Pitla
main.bio: Hello there!, I’m Suman, a Software Engineer with Web development experience and Keen intrest in Problem solving, now advancing towards becoming a Full-stack developer. I specialize in creating scalable web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. Driven by curiosity and a passion for technology, I constantly upgrade my skills to stay at the cutting edge. I thrive on challenges and excel in transforming complex requirements into high-quality solutions. Let’s connect and see how my expertise can add value to your next project.

education.school: Hyderabad Institute of Technology and Management - India

work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Developed a new blockchain interoperability approach with my team, enabling seamless asset exchange betweendifferent blockchains. This eliminated the need for third-party applications and intermediaries..

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: Engineered a cutting-edge survey platform that gleaned insights from diverse regions. Crafted an engaging user interface using React JS, Redux, and Chakra-UI. Seamlessly integrated APIs for a holistic user experience. Orchestrated production deployments on AWS using Jenkins for scalability and reliability.

work.company: International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad (IIITH)
work.title: Intern Trainee(Remote)
work.description: Contributed to a project involving language detection using audio samples (e.g., Telugu, Hindi, English) throughNatural Language Processing (NLP) and machine learning models.

projects.title: SocialFeed 2.0 (Next JS, Clerk, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS)
NetFlix Entertainment app (React JS, Redux, Tailwind CSS)
Podify music app (React JS, Redux Vite, Tailwind CSS)

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
